text: Cameron Mark King (born 10 September 1995) is a footballer who plays as a midfielder for King's Lynn. ==Career== King joined Norwich City's youth system at the age of eight. King made his senior début for Norwich City on 23 September 2014 in the League Cup in a 1–0 away loss to Shrewsbury Town. King and Norwich mutually agreed to end his contract early, in 2016.Nine out of contract to leave City, Norwich City's official website. Retrieved 10 June 2016 After a spell with Thetford Town, King joined League of Ireland Premier Division side Shamrock Rovers on 14 August 2017. On 24 August 2020, King re- signed for National League side Kings Lynn. ==International== King has represented Scotland at youth level. He scored a goal in his first appearance for the Scotland under-21s, a late equaliser in a 1–1 draw with Switzerland under-21s.Late King strike earns Under-21s draw in Switzerland, Scottish Football Association ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center;" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|Norwich City |2014–15 ||Championship |0||0||0||0||1||0||0||0||1||0 |- |rowspan="1"|FC Halifax Town |2018–19 ||National League |6||1||0||0||0||0||0||0||6||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !6!!1!!0!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!7!!1 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:English people of Scottish descent Category:Scottish footballers Category:Norwich City F.C. players Category:Thetford Town F.C. players Category:Shamrock Rovers F.C. players Category:FC Halifax Town players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sportspeople from Bury St Edmunds Category:Scotland under-21 international footballers
